name: Spider Strider
description:
The research facility has been overrun by genetically modified spiders, and you’re the last scientist alive. Chased by the giant queen, run, jump, and duck to avoid being webbed up and devoured.

This game was conceptualized and created in 14 days as a part of UC Santa Cruz's ARTG/CMPM 120 class.

Created By: Shaina Mishra, Rosie Longo, Chantel Gee, Daren Bartolucci
